title: Can't connect to chat.
body: When i launch the client and login, it says i'm not connect to the chat and it won't reconnect and i can't play because of it, any help?

replies.body: It seems like your network is blocking you from connecting to pvp.net, so you can't use chat features.  You'll want to make sure this is fixed in case you run into any other problems like connecting to a game.  Go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix that up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
The odd thing is i made a 2nd account and it lets me play with no problem. any idea why that is?
